mainHero.description: At Rizz Technologies, we are dedicated to transforming ideas into innovative web applications that drive business success. Our expert team of developers, designers, and strategists collaborates to deliver cutting-edge solutions tailored to your unique needs.

secondaryAction.href: mailto:rizztechnologies@gmail.com?subject=Greetings! I need support with my web development needs.

items.title: eLearn
items.description: Developed a sophisticated online learning platform utilizing Flask for backend functionality, MySQL for robust database management, and a blend of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a seamless frontend experience. Inspired by the functionalities of leading platforms such as Google Classroom, edX, and Brac University's student management portal, this project integrates a comprehensive suite of features, making it a powerful learning tool.

items.name: Flask
items.description: Flask is a lightweight Python web framework for building simple to complex applications.

items.name: Django
items.description: Django is a high-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
